amendment.description: Amendment permits the Department of Energy laboratories to team up with a university or consortium of universities when competing for DHS's Centers for Excellence.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 11 printed in part B of House Report 109-84 to permit Department of Energy laboratories to team up with a university or consortium of universities when competing for Department of Homeland Security's Centers for Excellence.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wamp amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Wamp.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wamp amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
